titleStmt.title: An excellent new song, called, The private encounter between two loyal lovers. Being sung in the last new play, called, The married beau.
Married Beau Selections
titleStmt.author: Crown, Mr. (John), 1640?-1712.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "Oh fye! what mean I foolish maid ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
